name: mail-to-self
title: Mail to Self
description: Send a quick subject + body to your inbox over SMTP without leaving Raycast.
author: MrMage

preferences.name: smtpHost
preferences.title: SMTP Host
preferences.description: Hostname of the SMTP server used to send messages.

preferences.name: smtpPort
preferences.title: SMTP Port
preferences.description: Port for your SMTP server (usually 465 or 587).

preferences.name: encryption
preferences.title: Encryption
preferences.description: Choose how to secure the SMTP connection.

preferences.name: allowSelfSigned
preferences.title: TLS Certificate
preferences.description: Skip certificate validation for trusted self-hosted servers only if you understand the risk.
preferences.label: Allow self-signed certificates

preferences.name: smtpUsername
preferences.title: SMTP Username
preferences.description: Leave empty if your server does not require authentication.

preferences.name: smtpPassword
preferences.title: SMTP Password
preferences.description: Stored securely in Raycast's encrypted preferences.

preferences.name: senderEmail
preferences.title: Sender Email
preferences.description: The From address used when sending notes.

preferences.name: recipientList
preferences.title: Recipients
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of recipients. Optional labels like Jane <jane@example.com> are supported.

commands.name: send-mail
commands.title: Mail to Self
commands.description: Compose and send a short email to yourself.
